title: In case of cessed properties MHADA/MBRRB may carry out repairs of buildings after obtaining remarks from MCGM as per provisions of the MHADA Act
clause_text: In case of cessed properties MHADA/MBRRB may carry out repairs of buildings after obtaining remarks from MCGM as per provisions of the MHADA Act. Remarks and observations if any as stated in these guidelines shall be complied with during the course of repairs.
